description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nBarbed Vines:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SNARED}. Your creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SNARED} intercept attacks and single-target spells on allies and take damage based on their {STAT_attack} instead of {STAT_defense}. This trait does not stack.
name: Poisoned Barb
